0: Mmm, tôi dường như không thể ngủ được...
1: Bụng tôi đau quá... Có phải bị đầy bụng không?
Có lẽ bữa tối vừa rồi ăn hơi nhiều...
3: Tôi có thể ngủ thêm một chút nữa...\w[30].\w[30].\w[30].
Có nên đi kiểm tra em gái không nhỉ?
8: G-Gì cơ? À, chỉ là một cơn ác mộng...
9: Tôi nghĩ mình vừa thấy một phiên bản \str[120] đáng sợ.
11: Ừ, giấc mơ đó thật đáng sợ...
Tốt hơn là nghỉ ngơi sớm...

0: \c[10]—Phát hiện yêu cầu cập nhật dữ liệu từ phiên bản \str[1].  \w[60]
Bạn có muốn thực hiện tự động cập nhật ngay bây giờ không?
2: Tôi cảm giác vừa có một giấc mơ về
3: Tôi có cái cảm giác ngủ không ngon...
4: Ah, đã sáng rồi sao? Tôi ngủ cực kì ngon.
5: Có phải nắng hơi gắt quá không?
7: Thời tiết hôm nay trông không được tốt lắm.
8: Hi vọng nó không ảnh hưởng đến chuyến phiêu lưu của mình...
9: Mấy ngày nay chưa đi kiểm tra em ấy...
Chắc hôm nay nên ghé qua.
10: Được rồi, dậy thôi. Kế hoạch hôm nay là—
12: Được rồi, đi kiểm tra \str[120] thôi!
13: Được rồi, giờ sắp xếp lại mọi thứ
và chuẩn bị cho chuyến phiêu lưu!

0: I finally realize I'm not in my usual bedroom.
Something warm and soft is pressed tight against me,
1: Right, the two of us were tangled together
2: Looking at her defenseless sleeping face,
still bearing a faint flush of last night's afterglow,
I can't help but reach out, my fingertips sinking softly
into her hair, smooth as silk.
4: As if sensing the affection, she lets out a hazy,
satisfied hum, subconsciously nuzzling into my palm.
5: "It's morning already. Can you get up?"
6: trying to wake her from her slumber.
7: After her long eyelashes flutter a few times,
she finally opens her eyes slowly.
She stares blankly into the void for a moment,
then tilts her head to look at me right beside her,
her pupils filled with the haze of sleep.
8: Why... are you in bed too...?"
9: It seems her brain hasn't quite finished booting up.
she just tilts her head, staring at me foolishly for a long time.
10: Not until the fragmented memories of last night
piece themselves back together does the blood rush
to her cheeks at a visible speed.
11: About last night... um... thank you..."
12: Completely at a loss as to how to handle such a bashful
predicament, she just lowers her head,
whispering a word of thanks that was somewhat nonsensical.
13: The atmosphere becomes subtle and cramped.
We silently dress with our backs to each other,
then, maintaining an indescribable tacit understanding,
we walk into the washroom together.
15: She only let out a muffled murmur,
clutching her pillow and burying her face even deeper.
16: Though I'm curious what kind of wonderful dream she's having,
since she's still so sound asleep,
it's better not to force her awake...
17: Last night's exertion was too much of a burden for her after all,
I should let her sleep a bit longer...
18: I gently peel away her arm still wrapped around me,
leaving the warm bed without making a single sound.
19: Taking one last look at her quiet profile,
slightly pale in the morning light,
I quietly exit the room and softly click the door shut.
20: Watching her defenseless sleeping face though I know she needs rest,
the quiet unique to this morning and the scent
she radiates keep provoking my sanity.
21: I meant to just pat her head,
but my fingertips involuntarily slide down her slender neck.
From her rounded shoulder to the slight curve of her waist,
I greedily feel every inch of her skin.
23: Even as she slept, her body that had just shed its innocence
was already reacting to my touch.
She let out a few unconscious whimpers as she felt
the warmth radiating from my fingertips.
24: How could I do this to her so early in the morning...

1: Tôi cảm thấy cực kì chóng mặt...
Tối qua tôi đã ngủ thiếp đi như vậy sao...?
2: "Tôi không nhớ chuyện gì đã xảy ra tối qua...  \w[90]
Chắc là tôi đã quá mệt thôi."
